original: Claesson, Carl Georg Douglas, rytt-mästare, Göteborg, f. 10/6/99 i Gbg av konsul Carl Magnus C. o. Catherine Augusta Olditch. G. 1. 29 m. Åsa Hal-(lencreutz; 2. 40 m. Marianne HcH-berg. Barn: Birgitta f. 30, Thomas 33, Sonja 41, Melcher 43. — Avg:ex. fr. Gbgs hand :inst. 17. Fänrik i Liv-reg. husarers res. 20, und:löjtn. i dito 23, löjtn. i dito 27, ryttmäst. 44. Mer-kant. anst. i Engl. 20, i Frankr. 21, i USA 27, verkst. dir. i D. T. Ahren-berg A-B i Gbg sed. 27, inneh. av föret. sed. 31. Panamas konsul i Gbg sed. 27. Hohby: galoppsport.
translated: Claesson, Carl Georg Douglas, cavalry captain, Gothenburg, born on June 10, 1899 in Gothenburg to Consul Carl Magnus C. and Catherine Augusta Olditch. Married 1st to Åsa Hallencreutz in 1929, and 2nd to Marianne Hchberg in 1940. Children: Birgitta (born in 1930), Thomas (born in 1933), Sonja (born in 1941), Melcher (born in 1943). He graduated from Gothenburg's School of Business in 1917 and became a Second Lieutenant in the Reserve of the Life Guards Hussar Regiment in 1920, Lieutenant in 1923, and Captain in 1944. He worked as a merchant in England in 1920, in France in 1921, and in the United States in 1927, and was the managing director of D.T. Ahrenberg AB in Gothenburg since 1927, and owned a business since 1931. He was the Consul of Panama in Gothenburg since 1927. His hobby was horse racing.

structured.name: Carl Georg Douglas Claesson
structured.description: Cavalry Captain and Panama Consul in Gothenburg. Managed D.T. Ahrenberg AB and owned a business.
